title: Advanced Shop System
description: Advanced shop system that is easy to implement in your private projects with advanced filters
longDescription:
The Unreal Engine Advanced Shop System Asset is a powerful tool that revolutionizes the way you implement shops in your game. With this asset, you can effortlessly create an immersive shopping experience for your players, allowing them to browse and buy with ease.


Asset Preview Video


Shop system starts with 12 predefined categories that can be extended. Each category and item is driven by database which allows you to easy add a new content and change statistics for each item. Items and categories can be searched in the search bar. Each type of item can have its own labeling category + there are common labeling categories like: star reviews, price limits, localization of item or sorthing methods such as name or price (ascending and descending).


Featuring a user-friendly interface, the asset enables players to filter items based on various criteria such as category, price range, rarity, and more. This intuitive filtering system ensures that players can quickly find the items they desire, saving them time and enhancing their overall shopping experience.


One of the standout features of this asset is its ability to provide a realistic 3D preview of each item. Players can examine items from every angle, zoom in to inspect intricate details. This feature adds a level of immersion and engagement that truly brings the shop to life. We can sort our items and add non-standard labels with its own categorisation methods. There is an economy feature that allows you to use versatile shop/sell system.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • 12 predefined categories with dynamic switching
  • Items with its characteristics that can be used for labeling
  • Economy system
  • Each item can display its description, name, ship country and 3D preview mesh if exists
  • Multiple ways to sort items: stars, price trags, name, location, custom labels

Number of Blueprints: 11

Input: No

Network No

Supported Development Platforms:


Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Video: https://youtu.be/gdTvSTytnJ4

Documentation: https://mega.nz/file/5BIyxCoC#x-o9y6OgB2vuUMVLWNpjr--8fW2mv3it11934L07t7E
